name.ja: メタル<ruby>化<rt>か</rt></ruby>・<ruby>鋼炎装甲<rt>フレイム・コーティング</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Tribute 1 face-up monster that mentions "Max Metalmorph"; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set and mentions "Max Metalmorph", ignoring its Summoning conditions, then you can equip this card to it with the following effect.
● If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can send this card to the GY instead.
You can only activate 1 "Flame Metalmorph" per turn.
